description:
A man is haunted by a ghost who wants him to leave his fish.  A flying man goes on a flying journey.  A greedy man repents of his attack on his brother.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oitekebori / The Flying Man and His Flying Journey / Otogirisou
Oitekebori / Tonda Otoko no Tonda Tabi / Otogirisou
おいてけ堀 / 飛んだ男の飛んだ旅 / 弟切草
